sentences.en: He had immense industry but he didn't know how to think.
sentences.cn: 他非常卖力,就是不知道怎样思考.

sentences.en: He said he retained immense regard and esteem for the prime minister.
sentences.cn: 他说他一直极其尊重和敬仰首相。

sentences.en: I think our main feeling would be of an immense gratitude.
sentences.cn: 我觉得充斥我们心中的将是一种强烈的感激之情。

sentences.en: I'd seen it before in people who held immense power.
sentences.cn: 我以前曾在掌握大权的人身上看到过这种情况。

sentences.en: People who travel by rail still read an immense amount.
sentences.cn: 人们坐火车旅行时仍然会读很多书。

sentences.en: Regular visits from a social worker can be of immense value to old people living alone.
sentences.cn: 对于独居老人来说社工的经常探望很重要。

sentences.en: She checked her sobs with an immense effort.
sentences.cn: 她费了好大劲才忍住了抽噎.

sentences.en: The expense of living is immense.
The porch is supported by six immense pillars.
sentences.cn: 门廊由六根大柱子支撑着.

sentences.en: The sea was rolling in immense surges.
The town takes immense pride in recent achievements.
sentences.cn: 全镇人对近来取得的成就都感到非常自豪。

sentences.en: They made an immense improvement in English.
sentences.cn: 在英语方面他们取得了巨大的进步.

sentences.en: They plunged into their work with immense zeal.
sentences.cn: 他们以极大的热情投入工作.

sentences.en: To my immense gratification, he fell into the trap.
sentences.cn: 令我极为满意的是, 他中了圈套.

sentences.en: We are not in this to reap immense financial rewards.
sentences.cn: 我们从事这一行不是为了获得巨大的经济回报。

sentences.en: With immense relief I stopped running.
sentences.cn: 我长长地松了一口气，停止了奔跑。

words.tran_cn: 极大地；无限地；广大地；庞大地
